video.title: Rozario to Banpaia
video.synopsis: When Tsukune accidentally enrolls in a school for monsters disguised as humans, he must hide the fact that he's really human or risk losing his life.

episodes.synopsis: Academically challenged Tsukune suddenly finds himself enrolled at a mysterious high school with a shocking secret.
episodes.title: New Life and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: Moka's obvious affection for Tsukune earns him the wrath of the school's male students, and a popular succubus is determined to seduce the poor boy.
episodes.title: Succubus and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: A mischievous young witch stirs up trouble between Moka and Tsukune, but will a ghastly confrontation with a trio of lizardmen change her outlook?
episodes.title: Witchling and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: The boys who make up Moka's fan club decide it's time to get rid of Tsukune, who is mortified that he's unable to protect his special lady friends.
episodes.title: Farewell and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: Tsukune's interest in a swimming club is a problem for Moka. Water has a strange effect on vampires, and a dip in the pool could sap her powers.
episodes.title: School Swimsuits and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: There's a rumor that Tsukune is the creep sneaking glances at other girls. Kurumu and Yukari get to the heart of the matter to clear his name.
episodes.title: Newspaper Club and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: Tsukune attracts yet another fangirl in Mizore. How can a girl express her feelings with troublesome teachers threatening expulsion?
episodes.title: Snow Girl and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: Private lessons from Tsukune's seductive math teacher start subtracting from his personality.
episodes.title: Math and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: Summer vacation calls the newspaper club to a human beach. Yukari is tempted to ditch school and join Ruby, a witch living in a sunflower field.
episodes.title: Summer Break and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: Ruby explains the plight of the sunflower fields to Yukari's rescuers, who prove to be a curiously kind bunch.
episodes.title: Sunflowers and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: Summer vacation is over and the newspaper club is getting back to work. Unfortunately, their efforts are complicated by the Public Safety Commission.
episodes.title: New Term and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: The newspaper club's attempt to expose the corruption of the Public Safety Commission backfires when Tsukune is arrested and accused of being human.
episodes.title: Security Committee and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: Moka finds an unlikely ally in her mission to prevent Tsukune's execution.
episodes.title: Tsukune and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: Tsukune's back at the academy for another year. Moka's popularity has only grown, but one of the letters in her locker is a death threat.
episodes.title: Reunion and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: Back in the day, Moka was able to defeat her younger sister every time they sparred, but now it looks like Kokoa is out for vengeance.
episodes.title: Little Sister and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: Kurumi and Mizore's mothers don't get along, and they get a little crazy when they learn that both of their daughters are into Tsukune.
episodes.title: Mother and Child and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: Yukari's new look makes quite a splash at school -- but she still can't seem to catch Tsukune's eye.
episodes.title: Body Measurements and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: Mizore's not having fun in cooking class; the group is making curry, and she's not into spicy foods.
episodes.title: Curry and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: Tsukune's gang heads to the hot springs on a field trip. Meanwhile, a rough-and-tumble rival school has set its sights on the Academy.
episodes.title: School Trip and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: Tsukune goes to visit his mom, who sees exactly what her son is up against when the girls start showing up in skimpy outfits.
episodes.title: Bathroom and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: It's an episode of super-short mini-episodes! The subjects include shopping, superheroism, bike riding, clashing taste buds, puppies and mini-skirts.
episodes.title: Youth and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: A ski trip turns into disaster when a massive avalanche roars down the mountain, trapping Tsukune in a cave.
episodes.title: Skiing and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: The popular new boy in school is making waves with Tsukune's girls, who seem to be powerless against his smooth-talking charm.
episodes.title: Pretty Boy and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: Chaos ensues when Tsukune's sister gets her hands on a special mirror that has the power to reveal the true nature of the student body.
episodes.title: Lilith's Mirror and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: Moka sacrifices her own rosary to seal the deteriorating barrier between the human world and the monster world.
episodes.title: Holy Seal and a Vampire

episodes.synopsis: If they ever hope to see the sweet side of Moka again, Tsukune and the girls must survive the perilous journey through the demon world.
episodes.title: Cross and Family and a Vampire
